name: Off The Rails Adventure
description:
Disaster has occurred, and it's up to a duo of UFOs to save the day! Use your grabber to team up and save a trainload of passengers from a treacherous cavern.

Features include:

  • Deadly lava!
  • Treacherous obstacles!
  • 2 Player Co-op action!
  • 2 Player Co-op failure!
  • Physics!

Created for ToJam 13 in Toronto by Team Pufferfish.
